Игры была топ, но после того когда она стала бесплатна пришли отбросы как школьники, так и читеры. Теперь эта игра помойная. Если вы будете играть кс, то только с братками, а не с рандомами

Con total seguridad puedo decir que es uno de los mejores FPS competitivos, buen equilibrio, gráficos aceptables y por lo demás todo correcto. El único problema es la pésima comunidad repleta de rusos tóxicos y monos en celo que no tienen ni puta idea de como va un ratón. QUITEN LOS 7 DÍAS DE RETENCIÓN DE ARTÍCULOS POST-INTERCAMBIO.
It's a really good game, nothing else to say. Just get it.

Chased some russians around a desert town and shot them dead.

Then i came home to play some CS:GO

this game is not for anyone over 40 years old. Now you have to play 1v1 in warmup aswell, which destroyed the game for me. Shooting my mate with negev for 4 minutes straight has always been the climax of a csgo match and it has been taken away from me. Atleast i can buy a smoking model with condom on head ;)))

Counter Strike has always been the pinnacle of FPS, 20 years and still going strong. CS is CS so i'm going to write reasons to play this except one.. playing this game will develop your basic skills for other FPS games. the fundamentals are all here.
